actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide more appropriate remedies for failures to report information relating to the earnings test.
short_title: Social Security Sanctions Reform Act of 1995
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Social Security Sanctions Reform Act of 1995 - Amends title II (Old-Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to revise amounts to be deducted from benefits for failures to report: (1) certain events, including noncovered work outside the United States or failures to have a child entitled to a benefit in care; and (2) earnings or wages.

titles.title: Social Security Sanctions Reform Act of 1995
To amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide more appropriate remedies for failures to report information relating to the earnings test.
